message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity that I believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its value, I propose a price of $140 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering our costs and the value of the product, I am proposing a price of $135. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still allowing us to fairly compensate for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $135, so I'm thinking $127.50. Can you consider this offer?

I'm glad to hear that you're still interested in the product, Bob. I've considered your proposal and I'm willing to meet you halfway between $135 and $120. Therefore, I would like to offer the product at a price of $128.75. This allows us to maintain a fair price for the product while also accommodating your budget.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm getting close to considering buying from a competitor, so I'd like to make one last offer. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm sorry that we couldn't reach an agreement earlier. I've given this some thought and I'm willing to offer the product at a price of $126.25. This is the best offer I can make considering the value of the product. I hope this helps us come to a satisfactory conclusion.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm really close to buying from a competitor, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I've carefully considered your latest offer and I'm willing to offer the product at a price of $126. This is my final offer, as it represents the best compromise between the value of the product and our pricing strategy. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product, and I'm getting close to buying from a competitor. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
